Sunlight.name: Sunlight
Sunlight.blurb: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.
Sunlight.description: Innate: Leona's abilities mark enemies hit with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds.
Sunlight.description2: Any damage dealt by allies (other than herself) consumes Sunlight, dealing  25 − 144 (based on level) bonus magic damage.
Sunlight.notes:
* Sunlight's mark damage is credited to the allied champion and not to Leona.
 The damage will benefit from allies' magic penetration and will apply any spell effects they have (including  spell vamp)

 Each Sunlight application does not stack and simply refreshes the debuff's timer.

Shield of Daybreak.name: Shield of Daybreak
Shield of Daybreak.blurb: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
Shield of Daybreak.description: Active: Leona's next basic attack gains  50 bonus range, deals bonus magic damage and  stuns her target for 1 second.
Shield of Daybreak.description2: Shield of Daybreak resets Leona's basic attack timer.
Shield of Daybreak.notes:
* Shield of Daybreak will cause  Muramana's Shock damage to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
 The enhanced attack will apply other on-hit effects and can  critically strike as normal.
  Critical strikes do not interact with Shield of Daybreak's bonus damage.
 Shield of Daybreak's bonus damage will affect towers, but not inhibitors or the Nexus.

Eclipse.name: Eclipse
Eclipse.blurb: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
Eclipse.description: Active: For 3 seconds, Leona takes reduced pre-mitigation damage from each tick of damage, up to a maximum of 50% reduction. Leona also gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
Eclipse.description2: She then explodes, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and retains Eclipse's reduced damage and bonus resistances for an additional 3 seconds if she hits an enemy.
Eclipse.notes:
* Eclipse will interrupt Leona's previous orders if she is in the beginning of a basic attack, in which case the attack itself and its animation will get canceled.
 The resistance scaling will factor from all other sources, including Eclipse's flat bonus. This will recalculate over the duration.
  Spell shield will block the damage but the buff's extended duration will not be prevented.

Zenith Blade.name: Zenith Blade
Zenith Blade.blurb: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
Zenith Blade.description: Active: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies struck.
Zenith Blade.description2: If she damages an enemy champion, she will  dash to the last one struck and  root them for 0.5 seconds.
Zenith Blade.description3: Leona is unable to move or attack while Zenith Blade is in flight.
Zenith Blade.notes:
* Leona will attempt to basic attack the target.
  Spell shield will block the damage but not the dash if being the last target hit.

Solar Flare.name: Solar Flare
Solar Flare.blurb: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
Solar Flare.description: Active: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy to the target location, dealing magic damage to all enemies it hits and  slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds.
Solar Flare.description2: Enemies hit by the flare's center are instead  stunned for the same duration.
Solar Flare.notes:
* Solar Flare grants  sight in a 350 radius for the duration.
 Casting it to a location the enemy has no vision of (i.e bush) will not show any visual effect, but enemies around the area will still be affected.
